name: MQTT Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 MQTT Tool 节点。主要用于: Push messages to MQTT

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Push messages to MQTT | (必填项)

topic.name: topic
topic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topic | 作用: The topic to publish to | (必填项)

sendInputData.name: sendInputData
sendInputData.description: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON
sendInputData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Input Data | 作用: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON | 默认值: True

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message to publish | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: retain (值: None) - Normally if a publisher publishes a message to a topic, and no one is subscribed to that topic the message is simply discarded by the broker. However the publisher can tell the broker to keep the last message on that topic by setting the retain flag to true.
